item.title: spring-security-oauth2 授权服务集成钉钉扫码登录
item.description: spring boot版本 <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>2.0.2.RELEASE</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> spring-security-oauth2版本 <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security.oauth</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-oauth2</artifactId> <version>2.2.0.RELEASE</version> </dependency> 实现原理： 参照spring-security
